verses.verse: Abraham <S%H85><s%> was old, <S%H2204><s%> and well stricken <S%H935><s%> in age. <S%H3117><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had blessed <S%H1288><s%> Abraham in all things. <S%H85><s%>

Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to his servant, <S%H5650><s%> the elder <S%H2205><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> who ruled over <S%H4910><s%> all that he had, <S%H7760><s%> "Please put your hand <S%H3027><s%> under my thigh. <S%H3409><s%>

I will make you swear <S%H7650><s%> by Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> and the God <S%H430><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that you shall not take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> whom I live. <S%H3427><s%>
But you shall go <S%H3212><s%> to my country, <S%H776><s%> and to my relatives, <S%H4138><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%>"

The servant <S%H5650><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H802><s%> "What if the woman isn't <S%H14><s%> willing to follow <S%H3212><s%> me <S%H310><s%> to this land? <S%H776><s%> Must I bring <S%H7725><s%> your son <S%H1121><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> you came from? <S%H3318><s%>"
Abraham <S%H85><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H8104><s%> "Beware that you don't <S%H6435><s%> bring <S%H7725><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> there again. <S%H7725><s%>

Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who took me <S%H3947><s%> from my father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and from the land <S%H776><s%> of my birth, <S%H1696><s%> who spoke to me, <S%H7650><s%> and who swore to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H5414><s%> 'I will give this land <S%H776><s%> to your seed. <S%H2233><s%>' He will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> before you, <S%H6440><s%> and you <S%H6440><s%> shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son from there. <S%H1121><s%>

If the woman <S%H802><s%> isn't <S%H14><s%> willing to follow <S%H3212><s%> you, <S%H310><s%> then you shall be clear <S%H5352><s%> from this my oath. <S%H7621><s%> Only you shall not bring <S%H7725><s%> my son <S%H1121><s%> there again. <S%H7725><s%>"

The servant <S%H5650><s%> put <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> under the thigh <S%H3409><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his master, <S%H113><s%> and swore <S%H7650><s%> to him concerning <S%H5921><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> matter. <S%H1697><s%>

The servant <S%H5650><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> camels, <S%H1581><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%>'s camels, <S%H1581><s%> and departed, <S%H3212><s%> having a variety of good things <S%H2898><s%> of his master <S%H113><s%>'s with him. <S%H3027><s%> He arose, <S%H6965><s%> and went <S%H3212><s%> to Mesopotamia, <S%H763><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> of Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>

He made <S%H1288><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> kneel down <S%H1288><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> by <S%H413><s%> the well <S%H875><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of evening, <S%H6153><s%> the time <S%H6256><s%> that women go out <S%H3318><s%> to draw water. <S%H7579><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> please give me <S%H6440><s%> success <S%H7136><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> and show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to <S%H5973><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham. <S%H85><s%>

Behold, <S%H5324><s%> I am standing by the spring <S%H5869><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> are coming out <S%H3318><s%> to draw <S%H7579><s%> water. <S%H4325><s%>

Let it happen, <S%H5291><s%> that the young lady to whom I will say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H5186><s%> 'Please let down your pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> that I may drink, <S%H8354><s%>' and she will say, <S%H559><s%> <S%H8354><s%> 'Drink, and I will also give <S%H8248><s%> your camels <S%H1581><s%> a drink, <S%H8248><s%>'â€”let her be the one you have appointed <S%H3198><s%> for your servant <S%H5650><s%> Isaac. <S%H3327><s%> By this I will know <S%H3045><s%> that you have shown <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> to my master. <S%H113><s%>"

It happened, <S%H3615><s%> before he had finished speaking, <S%H1696><s%> that behold, <S%H7259><s%> Rebekah came out, <S%H3318><s%> who <S%H834><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> to Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Nahor, <S%H5152><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s brother, <S%H251><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder. <S%H7926><s%>

The young lady <S%H5291><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> beautiful <S%H2896><s%> to look at, <S%H4758><s%> a virgin, <S%H1330><s%> neither had any man <S%H376><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> her. <S%H3381><s%> She went down to the spring, <S%H5869><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> her pitcher, <S%H3537><s%> and came up. <S%H5927><s%>

The servant <S%H5650><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> to meet her, <S%H7125><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> "Please give me a drink, <S%H1572><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from your pitcher. <S%H3537><s%>"

She said, <S%H559><s%> "Drink, <S%H8354><s%> my lord. <S%H113><s%>" She hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and let down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her hand, <S%H3027><s%> and gave him drink. <S%H8248><s%>

When she had done <S%H3615><s%> giving him drink, <S%H8248><s%> she said, <S%H559><s%> "I will also draw <S%H7579><s%> for your camels, <S%H1581><s%> until they have done <S%H3615><s%> drinking. <S%H8354><s%>"

She hurried, <S%H4116><s%> and emptied <S%H6168><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> into the trough, <S%H8268><s%> and ran <S%H7323><s%> again to the well <S%H875><s%> to draw, <S%H7579><s%> and drew <S%H7579><s%> for all his camels. <S%H1581><s%>

The man <S%H376><s%> looked steadfastly <S%H7583><s%> at her, <S%H2790><s%> remaining silent, to know <S%H3045><s%> whether Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had made <S%H6743><s%> his journey <S%H1870><s%> prosperous <S%H6743><s%> or not. <S%H518><s%>

It happened, <S%H1581><s%> as the camels had done <S%H3615><s%> drinking, <S%H8354><s%> that the man <S%H376><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a golden <S%H2091><s%> ring <S%H5141><s%> of half a shekel <S%H1235><s%> weight, <S%H4948><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> bracelets <S%H6781><s%> for her hands <S%H3027><s%> of ten <S%H6235><s%> shekels weight <S%H4948><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%>

and said, <S%H559><s%> "Whose <S%H4310><s%> daughter <S%H1323><s%> are you? <S%H859><s%> Please tell <S%H5046><s%> me. <S%H3426><s%> Is there room <S%H4725><s%> in your father <S%H1><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> for us to lodge in? <S%H3885><s%>"
She said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H1323><s%> "I am the daughter of Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> whom she bore <S%H3205><s%> to Nahor. <S%H5152><s%>"

She said <S%H559><s%> moreover to him, <S%H1571><s%> "We have both straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> enough, <S%H7227><s%> and <S%H1571><s%> room <S%H4725><s%> to lodge in. <S%H3885><s%>"
The man <S%H376><s%> bowed his head, <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who has not forsaken <S%H5800><s%> his loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H571><s%> toward my master. <S%H113><s%> As for me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh has led me <S%H5148><s%> in the way <S%H1870><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%>'s relatives. <S%H251><s%>"
The young lady <S%H5291><s%> ran, <S%H7323><s%> and told <S%H5046><s%> her mother <S%H517><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%> about these words. <S%H1697><s%>

Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> had a brother, <S%H251><s%> and his name <S%H8034><s%> was Laban. <S%H3837><s%> Laban <S%H3837><s%> ran <S%H7323><s%> out <S%H2351><s%> to the man, <S%H376><s%> to the spring. <S%H5869><s%>

It happened, <S%H7200><s%> when he saw the ring, <S%H5141><s%> and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on his sister <S%H269><s%>'s hands, <S%H3027><s%> and when he heard <S%H8085><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of Rebekah <S%H7259><s%> his sister, <S%H269><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This <S%H3541><s%> is what the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to me, <S%H935><s%>" that he came to the man. <S%H376><s%> Behold, <S%H5975><s%> he was standing by <S%H5921><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> at the spring. <S%H5869><s%>

He said, <S%H559><s%> "Come in, <S%H935><s%> you blessed <S%H1288><s%> of Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> Why do you stand <S%H5975><s%> outside? <S%H2351><s%> For I have prepared <S%H6437><s%> the house, <S%H1004><s%> and room <S%H4725><s%> for the camels. <S%H1581><s%>"

The man <S%H376><s%> came <S%H935><s%> into the house, <S%H1004><s%> and he unloaded <S%H6605><s%> the camels. <S%H1581><s%> He gave <S%H5414><s%> straw <S%H8401><s%> and provender <S%H4554><s%> for the camels, <S%H1581><s%> and water <S%H4325><s%> to wash <S%H7364><s%> his feet <S%H7272><s%> and the feet <S%H7272><s%> of the men who were with him. <S%H582><s%>

Food was set <S%H7760><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%> to eat, <S%H398><s%> but he said, <S%H559><s%> "I will not eat <S%H398><s%> until I have told <S%H1696><s%> my message. <S%H1697><s%>" He said, <S%H559><s%> "Speak on. <S%H1696><s%>"
He said, <S%H559><s%> "I am Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s servant. <S%H5650><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> my master <S%H113><s%> greatly. <S%H3966><s%> He has become great. <S%H1431><s%> He has given <S%H5414><s%> him flocks <S%H6629><s%> and herds, <S%H1241><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> male servants <S%H5650><s%> and female servants, <S%H8198><s%> and camels <S%H1581><s%> and donkeys. <S%H2543><s%>

Sarah, <S%H8283><s%> my master <S%H113><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%> to my master <S%H113><s%> when <S%H310><s%> she was old. <S%H2209><s%> He has given all that he has to him. <S%H5414><s%>

My master <S%H113><s%> made me swear, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3947><s%> 'You shall not take a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of the Canaanites, <S%H3669><s%> in whose land <S%H776><s%> I live, <S%H3427><s%>
but <S%H518><s%> you shall go <S%H3212><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> and to my relatives, <S%H4940><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son. <S%H1121><s%>'
I asked <S%H559><s%> my master, <S%H113><s%> <S%H802><s%> 'What if the woman will not follow me? <S%H3212><s%>'

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, before <S%H6440><s%> whom I walk, <S%H1980><s%> will send <S%H7971><s%> his angel <S%H4397><s%> with you, <S%H6743><s%> and prosper your way. <S%H1870><s%> You shall take <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> for my son <S%H1121><s%> of my relatives, <S%H4940><s%> and of my father <S%H1><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>

Then will you be clear <S%H5352><s%> from my oath, <S%H423><s%> when you come <S%H935><s%> to my relatives. <S%H4940><s%> If they don't <S%H5414><s%> give her to you, <S%H5355><s%> you shall be clear from my oath. <S%H423><s%>'

I came <S%H935><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> to the spring, <S%H5869><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3068><s%> 'Yahweh, the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> if now you do <S%H3426><s%> prosper <S%H6743><s%> my way <S%H1870><s%> which I go <S%H1980><s%>â€”

behold, <S%H5324><s%> I am standing by this spring <S%H5869><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%> Let it happen, <S%H5959><s%> that the maiden who comes out <S%H3318><s%> to draw, <S%H7579><s%> to whom I will say, <S%H559><s%> "Please give me <S%H8248><s%> a little <S%H4592><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from your pitcher <S%H3537><s%> to drink, <S%H8248><s%>"

and she will tell me, <S%H8354><s%> "Drink, and I will also draw <S%H7579><s%> for your camels, <S%H1581><s%>"â€”let her be the woman <S%H802><s%> whom Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has appointed for my master <S%H113><s%>'s son. <S%H1121><s%>'

Before I had finished <S%H3615><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> in my heart, <S%H3820><s%> behold, <S%H7259><s%> Rebekah came out <S%H3318><s%> with her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> on her shoulder. <S%H7926><s%> She went down <S%H3381><s%> to the spring, <S%H5869><s%> and drew. <S%H7579><s%> I said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H8248><s%> 'Please let me drink.'

She hurried <S%H4116><s%> and let down <S%H3381><s%> her pitcher <S%H3537><s%> from her shoulder, <S%H559><s%> and said, <S%H8354><s%> 'Drink, and I will also give <S%H8248><s%> your camels <S%H1581><s%> a drink. <S%H8248><s%>' So I drank, <S%H8354><s%> and she also gave <S%H8248><s%> the camels <S%H1581><s%> a drink. <S%H8248><s%>

I asked <S%H7592><s%> her, <S%H559><s%> and said, <S%H1323><s%> 'Whose daughter are you? <S%H559><s%>' She said, <S%H1323><s%> 'The daughter of Bethuel, <S%H1328><s%> Nahor <S%H5152><s%>'s son, <S%H1121><s%> whom Milcah <S%H4435><s%> bore <S%H3205><s%> to him. <S%H7760><s%>' I put the ring <S%H5141><s%> on her nose, <S%H639><s%> and the bracelets <S%H6781><s%> on her hands. <S%H3027><s%>

I bowed my head, <S%H6915><s%> and worshiped <S%H7812><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of my master <S%H113><s%> Abraham, <S%H85><s%> who had led me <S%H5148><s%> in the right <S%H571><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> to take <S%H3947><s%> my master <S%H113><s%>'s brother <S%H251><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%> for his son. <S%H1121><s%>

Now if you will <S%H3426><s%> deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with my master, <S%H113><s%> tell <S%H5046><s%> me. <S%H5046><s%> If not, tell me, <S%H6437><s%> that I may turn to the right hand, <S%H3225><s%> or <S%H176><s%> to the left. <S%H8040><s%>"

Then Laban <S%H3837><s%> and Bethuel <S%H1328><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> "The <S%H559><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> proceeds <S%H3318><s%> from Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%> We can't <S%H3201><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to you bad <S%H7451><s%> or <S%H176><s%> good. <S%H2896><s%>

Behold, <S%H7259><s%> Rebekah is before you. <S%H6440><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> her, <S%H3212><s%> and go, and let her be your master <S%H113><s%>'s son <S%H1121><s%>'s wife, <S%H802><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"
It happened that when Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s servant <S%H5650><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> their words, <S%H1697><s%> he bowed <S%H7812><s%> himself down to the earth <S%H776><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

The servant <S%H5650><s%> brought out <S%H3318><s%> jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver, <S%H3701><s%> and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> and clothing, <S%H899><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them to Rebekah. <S%H7259><s%> He also gave <S%H5414><s%> precious things <S%H4030><s%> to her brother <S%H251><s%> and her mother. <S%H517><s%>

They ate <S%H398><s%> and drank, <S%H8354><s%> he and the men <S%H582><s%> who were with him, <S%H3885><s%> and stayed all night. They rose up <S%H6965><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and he said, <S%H559><s%> "Send me away <S%H7971><s%> to my master. <S%H113><s%>"

Her brother <S%H251><s%> and her mother <S%H517><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Let the young lady <S%H5291><s%> stay <S%H3427><s%> with us a few days, <S%H3117><s%> at least <S%H176><s%> ten. <S%H6218><s%> After <S%H310><s%> that she will go. <S%H3212><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H309><s%> "Don't hinder me, since Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has prospered <S%H6743><s%> my way. <S%H1870><s%> Send me away <S%H7971><s%> that I may go <S%H3212><s%> to my master. <S%H113><s%>"
They said, <S%H559><s%> "We will call <S%H7121><s%> the young lady, <S%H5291><s%> and ask <S%H7592><s%> her. <S%H6310><s%>"
They called <S%H7121><s%> Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to her, <S%H3212><s%> "Will you go with this man? <S%H376><s%>" She said, <S%H559><s%> "I will go. <S%H3212><s%>"
They sent away <S%H7971><s%> Rebekah, <S%H7259><s%> their sister, <S%H269><s%> with her nurse, <S%H3243><s%> Abraham <S%H85><s%>'s servant, <S%H5650><s%> and his men. <S%H582><s%>
